::: {#hero-heading}

Jade Yue Yuan is a lecturer at Zhejiang Wanli University. She obtained a Ph.D. in Economics from Xiamen University in 2025.

Her current research focuces on digital economy. Jade is passionate about observing economic and business phenomena in daily life and is enthusiastic about applying new technologies such as AI to practical economic and business problems.

She has published academic papers in Economic Analysis and Policy and Appled Economic Letter, among other CSSCI and SSCI indexed journals.
